snippet.title: Drivinity Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A student project from  Breda University, NHTV, The Netherlands. 
Developed by team Godspeed.

Drivinity is a fast-paced anti-gravity racing game where Egyptian Gods collide in an epic race to decide once and for all who is superior.

Artists:
Miroslav Harant – Art Lead / General Artist
Kim de Graaf – Vehicle Artist / Prop Artist
Neall Jacobs – Environmental Artist
Samirah Evers – Technical Artist
Thijs Smits – Environmental Artist / World Builder

Designers:
Luc Smits – Lead Design / General Design
Laura van Schaijk – Scrum Master
Oscar Hoekman – Level Design
Bas Sweere – Level Design
Dave Mendoza – U.I. Design / QA
Billy Becker – Audio Design / Narrative

Programmers:
Luca Quartesan – Product Owner / Gameplay
Tim Lucassen – Lead Programming
Viktor Zoutman – Graphics Programmer
Emilio Laiso – Graphics Programmer
Darius Bouma – Graphics Programmer
Ivo Dimitrov – A.I. Programmer 
Jasper Drescher – Engine Programmer
Jelle de Stigter – Physics / Audio Programmer
Rodolfo Fava – A.I. Programmer
Nikita Glusjenko – Engine Programmer

Song by: Fascinating Earthbound Objects
